commenter_a: Odd that many who are not on food stamps complain when those who are eligible have carts full of healthy/quality food: seafood, steak, fresh produce. It's America -where life is a competition. If you need help, you stay at the bottom.
post_message: People who rely on federal food stamps ate about the same number of calories, but consumed fewer fruits and vegetables and whole grains and more added sugars, according to studies.
